tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE relationships (
    relationship_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    media_outlet_id INT,
    journalist_id INT,
    pr_team_id INT,
    relationship_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (media_outlet_id) REFERENCES media_outlets(media_outlet_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (journalist_id) REFERENCES journalists(journalist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pr_team_id) REFERENCES public_relations_teams(pr_team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE journalists (
    journalist_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    journalist_name VARCHAR(255),
    journalist_email VARCHAR(255),
    outlet_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (outlet_id) REFERENCES media_outlets(outlet_id)
);

CREATE TABLE journalists_public_relations_teams (
    journalist_id INT,
    pr_team_id INT,
    PRIMARY KEY (journalist_id, pr_team_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (journalist_id) REFERENCES journalists(journalist_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (pr_team_id) REFERENCES public_relations_teams(pr_team_id)
);

CREATE TABLE articles (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    article_title VARCHAR(255),
    article_content TEXT,
    journalist_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (journalist_id) REFERENCES journalists(journalist_id)
);
